abstract: Oakland, Calif, Mayor Libby Schaaf removes interim Police Chief Ben Fairow due to widening sex scandal involving several officers and underage girl.

headline.print_headline: Oakland’s Interim Police Chief Is Removed After Six Days
headline.main: Oakland Mayor Removes Police Chief Days After Appointing Him

snippet: Mayor Libby Schaaf said new information had led her to lose confidence in the interim chief, Ben Fairow. Officers are accused of having sex with an underage girl.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Libby Schaaf said new information had led her to lose confidence in the interim chief, Ben Fairow. Officers are accused of having sex with an underage girl.
